author: Zeke Turner
title: Merkel Reaches Coalition Deal With Social Democrats, but Hurdle Remains
text:
BERLIN—German Chancellor Angela Merkel moved within reach of a fourth term after clinching a coalition deal that would keep Germany’s shrinking political mainstream in power but could leave her presiding over an unstable and fractious government.
The 177-page agreement reached early Wednesday between Ms. Merkel’s conservatives and the center-left Social Democratic Party, or SPD, reconstitutes the so-called grand coalition that has governed Germany since 2013 but transfers the powerful finance ministry from her Christian Democratic...
